text: Facelina rutila is a species of sea slug, an aeolid nudibranch, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Facelinidae.MolluscaBase (2018). Facelina rutila Pruvot-Fol, 1951. Accessed on 2018-02-17. ==Distribution== This species was described from France. ==References== Category:Facelinidae Category:Gastropods described in 1951
title: Facelina rutila
